sentences.en: Cut the dough in half and shape each half into a loaf.
sentences.cn: 将生面团一切为二，再分别揉成长条形。

sentences.en: Don't loaf about while there's so much to be done.
sentences.cn: 还有这么多事情要干,别胡混了!

sentences.en: Going to be a useful boy , so long as you use your loaf.
sentences.cn: 只要运用你的头脑,就会成为有用的年轻人.

sentences.en: He slices off a thick piece from the loaf.
sentences.cn: 他从面包上切下了厚厚的一片.

sentences.en: I need a loaf of bread.
Is it right to loaf around when so much work needs to be done?
sentences.cn: 有这么多工作要干,游手好闲对 吗 ?

sentences.en: Or what man of you, if his son asks him for a loaf, will give him a stone?
sentences.cn: 再说,你们中间谁的儿子要个面包, 能给他一块石头 吗 ?

sentences.en: Pick up a quart of milk or a loaf of bread.
sentences.cn: 拿1夸脱牛奶或一条面包。

sentences.en: Spread the inside of the loaf with olive paste or pesto sauce for extra flavour.
sentences.cn: 在面包里面涂些橄榄酱或香蒜酱会更好吃。

sentences.en: That small loaf won't go far among this large family!
sentences.cn: 那一小条面包全家人吃不了多久的.

sentences.en: The cost of a loaf of bread has increased five-fold.
sentences.cn: 一条面包的价钱增长了4倍。

sentences.en: The proposal could put 3p on a loaf of bread.
sentences.cn: 这项提议会使每个面包的成本增加3便士。

sentences.en: There were always a lot of men loafing in the shop.
sentences.cn: 总有许多人在商店里闲逛。

sentences.en: Weigh that loaf of bread on the balance , please.
sentences.cn: 把那块面包放在秤上称一称.
